title: Opulent Oberoi Mumbai Stay with Romantic All-Inclusive Kerala Backwaters Cruise
description: Revel in the height of Indian opulence with two luxurious nights at the five-star The Oberoi, Mumbai, and a two-night cruise experience along Kerala’s backwaters. During your award-winning stay at The Oberoi, Mumbai, you’ll be treated to daily buffet breakfast, daily lounge access with evening cocktails and canapes, complimentary Wi-Fi, a 20% discount on food and beverages to use at any on-site restaurant and return airport transfers in a luxury car. Afterwards, make your own flight arrangements from Mumbai to Cochin Airport for a two-night, all-inclusive Kerala backwaters cruise on The Oberoi Motor Vessel in a Deluxe Cabin with inclusive dining (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), all shore excursions with an expert guide, evening entertainment and return transfers between Cochin Airport and Vembanad Lake Jetty in Kerala.
